snippet: A reporter takes the same route from Liberia to the United States as Thomas Eric Duncan, the man who, after traveling on to Dallas, fell to the disease.
abstract: Reporter's Notebook; Times reporter Helene Cooper describes experience of undergoing enhanced airport security measures intended to curb Ebola transmission during trip back to United States from Liberia.
lead_paragraph: A reporter takes the same route from Liberia to the United States as Thomas Eric Duncan, the man who, after traveling on to Dallas, fell to the disease.

headline.main: In Travel Out of Liberia, Nothing Is Simply Routine
headline.print_headline: In Travel Out of Liberia, Nothing Is Simply Routine
